mapper.insert: insert into com_issue_log ( id, error_location, sub_system, error_type, description, description_add, date_time, send_flg ) values ( NULL, #{error_location}, #{sub_system_value}, #{error_type_value}, #{description}, #{description_add}, #{date_time}, #{send_flg} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, error_location, sub_system AS sub_system_value, error_type AS error_type_value, description, description_add, date_time, send_flg FROM com_issue_log WHERE send_flg = #{send_flg} AND sub_system = #{sub_system} ORDER BY date_time LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
